# workflow namename: Hexo Blog CI# master branch on push, auto runon:   push:    branches:      - master      jobs:  build:     runs-on: ubuntu-latest             steps:    # check it to your workflow can access it    # from: https://github.com/actions/checkout    - name: Checkout Repository master branch      uses: actions/checkout@master           # from: https://github.com/actions/setup-node      - name: Setup Node.js 12.x       uses: actions/setup-node@master      with:        node-version: "12.x"        - name: Setup Hexo Dependencies      run: |        npm install hexo-cli -g        npm install                - name: Setup Deploy Private Key      env:        HEXO_DEPLOY_PRIVATE_KEY: ${{ secrets.HEXO_DEPLOY_PRIVATE_KEY }}      run: |        mkdir -p ~/.ssh/        echo "$HEXO_DEPLOY_PRIVATE_KEY" > ~/.ssh/id_rsa         chmod 600 ~/.ssh/id_rsa        ssh-keyscan github.com >> ~/.ssh/known_hosts                    - name: Setup Git Infomation      run: |         git config --global user.name '<ä½ çš„ç”¨æˆ·å>'         git config --global user.email '<ä½ ç™»å½•çš„email>'    - name: Deploy Hexo       run: |        hexo clean        hexo generate         hexo deploy
